ratings.comment: Prof. Silwal explains things on the board and walks through core concepts. His lectures are really engaging and you can tell he has a passion for it. He meets students and answers questions online.

My favorite CS prof so far! Definitely a hard class but his lectures are AMAZING. He breaks down concepts really well (even really hard ones). He really explains things well on the chalk board rather than just reading off slides. Homeworks are hard but give a really good intuition of the topics. I would recommend taking him over Renault's lecture.
Course materials were not explained in a comprehensible way. Wouldn't recommend students with weak  fundamentals to take 577 with him.

The professor is extremely rude and does not value his students' opinion. He does not bother to upload grades, resources or even reminders to submit homework on canvas. If you try him prove why your answer is correct or even why you think you are correct, he will not let you speak. Learnt more from the TA than the instructor himself.
